text: James Carmichael Renick (December 8, 1948 - January 3, 2021) was an American academic. He was the Chancellor of University of Michiganâ€“Dearborn from 1993 to 1999 and of North Carolina A&T; State University from 1999 to 2006. He was born in Rockford, Illinois. Renick died on January 3, 2021 in Greensboro, North Carolina from problems caused by amyotrophic lateral sclerosis, aged 72. ==References== Category:1948 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Academics from Michigan Category:Educators from Greensboro, North Carolina Category:Writers from Greensboro, North Carolina Category:Writers from Rockford, Illinois Category:Academics from North Carolina
title: James C. Renick
